description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EditionGuard Dev Team EditionGuard for WooCommerce – eBook Sales with DRM allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects EditionGuard for WooCommerce – eBook Sales with DRM: from n/a through 3.4.2.

product.name: EditionGuard for WooCommerce – eBook Sales with DRM
